alert.note: Alert for Logan; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 10:57PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wichita and south central Logan Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1057 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles north of Leoti, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Wichita and south central Logan Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for west central Kansas.
